definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: kiss (NH id., As. našâku, Targum [[נְשֵׁיק]], [[נְשַׁק]], Syr. n4aq, kiss (orig. smell [na4iqa] acc. to Lag:Nov. Psalt. Spec. 24 f.): Ar. nasaqa is fasten together, arrange in order, Eth. nsaq pt. ordine dispositus, apte sertus Di:641, pos. akin to II. [[נשׁק]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[נ]] 1Ki 19:18, 2Sa 15:5; 3 fs. [[נׇֽשְׁקָה]] Pr 7:13; 3 pl. [[נׇשָָׁקוּ]] Ps 85:11; Impf. [[יִּשַּׁק]] Ge 41:40, [[וַיִּשַּׁק]] Ge 27:27 +; sf. [[יִשָּׁקֵ֫נִי]] Ct So 1:2; 1 s.. cohort. [[אֶשֳּׁקָה־]] 1Ki 19:20; 3 mpl. [[יִשָּׁקָוּן]] Ho 13:2, etc.; Imv. [[וּשֲׁקָה]] Ge 27:26; Inf. cstr. [[נְשָׁק־]] 2Sa 20:9; —kiss, usu. c. [[לְ]] pers.: Ge 27:26, Ge 27:29, Ge 50:1, Ex 4:27 (all J), Ge 48:10, Ex 18:7 (both E), 2Sa 15:5, 2Sa 14:33, 2Sa 19:40, 2Sa 20:9, 1Ki 19:20, Pr 7:13, Ru 1:9, Ru 1:4; so of idol-worship 1Ki 19:18 (cf. We:Skizzen iii. 105; Heid. 109), cf. [[וַתִּשַּׁק יׇדִי לְפִי]] Job 31:27 and my hand hath kissed my mouth; rarely c. acc. pers. 1Sa 20:41 ([[אִישׁ]] [[אֶת־רֵעֵהוּ]]), sf. pers. 1Sa 10:1, Ct So 1:2 (+ [[מִגְּשִׁיקוֹת]]), So 8:1, also Ge 33:4 [[וַׁיִּׁשָּׁׂקֵׂהׂוּׁ]] (J; Holz E; wd. suspicious, Di rejects); ´[[עֲגׇלִים יִשּׁ]] Ho 13:2 claves do they kiss; [[שְׁפָתַיִם יִשָָּׁק]] Pr 24:26 lips he kisses; abs. Ps 85:11 (fig., recipr.) .—[[עַל־פִּי ְיִשַּׁק]] Ge 41:40 is dub., Di. ‘to thy mouth all my people shall yield’ (fit, adapt themselves, cf. Ar. √), so Kau Buhl:Lex, but this meaning uncertain, and text perh. corrupt, v. Di Holz).

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: : c. [[לְ]] pers. Ge 29:13(J), Ge 31:28, Ge 32:1, Ge 45:15 (all E); [[נַשְּׁקו־בַר]] Ps 2:12 is dub., cf. I. [[בַּר]] p. 135 a supr.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מַשִּׁיקוֹתּ]] Ez Eze 3:13 of wings of cherubim, gently touching each other (c. [[אֶל־]]).
